message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $95. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to share the product. I am interested in purchasing it, but I can only afford to pay $85. I hope this aligns with your expectations.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $85 is a bit too low for me.  Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $90?

I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose $87 as the purchase price for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle of our current offers.
